Text:
Does this version have the hard coded Arabic subs which makes reading the English subs from the .srt file difficult to read.

I have previously downloaded:Ajami.2009.SUBBED.DVDRip.XviD.HORiZON-ArtSubs.avi

Which was not worth watching because of the above problem.

Comments from any one who has downloaded this version ?

When they speak arabic in the movie there's hebrew subtitles, which makes the english subtitles a bit difficult to read. 
But it's bearable and the movie is really good!
